Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.auth

Class DKIMSignature

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.auth.DKIMSignature
  • public class DKIMSignature
extends java.lang.Object
    Parsed DKIM-Signature header as defined in RFC 6376.

    A DKIM signature contains tags that specify the signing domain, selector, algorithm, signed headers, and the signature itself.

    Author:
    Chris Burdess
    See Also:
    RFC 6376 - DKIM

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DKIMSignature()
      Creates an empty DKIM signature for parsing.

      • parse

        public static DKIMSignature parse​(java.lang.String headerValue)
        Parses a DKIM-Signature header value.
        Parameters:
        headerValue - the header value (after "DKIM-Signature:")
        Returns:
        the parsed signature, or null if invalid
